Key Match Events: The Hawks pulled away for good with a 14-0 run in the middle of the fourth quarter that made it 116-97. David Roddy ignited it with a 3 and Johnson had three dunks during the spurt.

Others: The game was played on November 4, 2024, with the Hawks defeating the Pelicans 126-111.
